name: 林赛·罗斯·达文波特
name_full: 林赛·罗斯·达文波特 Lindsay Ross Davenport
introduction: Lindsay Ross is a film and television actress born and raised in upstate New York. Lindsay moved to New York City three days after graduating with a BA in Theater from Binghamton University. There, she worked as an intern at the MCC Theater and performed in new musical workshops.After moving to Nashville in 2012, Lindsay started focusing on TV&Film. Since then she has co-starred on Nashville CMT and Still the King. Her commercial work includes national campaigns for Visionworks and AllState.Lindsay studies with Caroline Locorriere at Nashville Acting Studio. She is represented by McCray Agency in Nashville, Tennessee and Maxwell Garafolo Management in Los Angeles, California.
